name: ai-accessibility-enhancer
description: AI Accessibility Enhancer - WCAG 2.2-AA uyumlu Chrome uzantısı. Element seviyesinde AI destekli erişilebilirlik analizi ve geliştirme önerileri sunar.
author: WCAG Accessibility Expert

scripts.build: vite build && vite build --config vite.content.config.ts && npm run post-build
scripts.post-build: mkdir dist\icons 2>nul & powershell -command "[System.IO.File]::WriteAllBytes('dist\icons\icon-16.png', [System.Convert]::FromBase64String(''))" & copy dist\icons\icon-16.png dist\icons\icon-32.png & copy dist\icons\icon-16.png dist\icons\icon-48.png & copy dist\icons\icon-16.png dist\icons\icon-128.png & copy public\manifest.json dist\manifest.json
